[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@formidable-webview/webshell](./webshell.md) &gt; [ElementCSSBoxDimensions](./webshell.elementcssboxdimensions.md) &gt; [scale](./webshell.elementcssboxdimensions.scale.md)

## ElementCSSBoxDimensions.scale property

The ratio between the `WebView` width in dpi and the `window.innerWidth` in CSS pixels.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scale: number;
```

## Remarks

The other values in this object are already in React Native dpi units.
